section.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Commissioner shall publish a notice of the filing of the agreement.
The notice shall be published in the Maryland Register as provided in the State Documents Law.

text.section:
Subject to confirmation by the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation, the Commissioner may approve an agreement without the notice required by this section if:
The agreement and proposed transaction meet the requirements of § 3-706 of this subtitle;
The financial condition or stability of one of the constituent banks is such that a delay of the proposed transaction will cause an economic hardship to it; and
Approval of the agreement is in the public interest.
